TextView.android:text: Phulkuri publishes its monthly magazine “Phukuri” regularly since 1979. Phulkuri Ashar has a publication sell which publishes different forms, book lets, and literatures of the organization, diaries, souvenirs etc. Phulkuri arranges regular classes for literature, science, drawing and painting, song recitation and drama. A large number of member’s participates in these classes to flourish their talents.

(1)
All Phulkuri members are brothers to each other.One must convey ‘salaam’ or greetings to another when they meet each other. (2)
Always speak the truth and be unique in word and action. (3)
Respect the other, love the younger and be cordial in dealing with friends. (4)
At first find out own faults, if any then check the fault of others. (5)
If a member finds some thing wrong with others, then correct this showing sympathy with out any affront and take it easily. (6)
Try to avoid quarrelsome situation. (7)
Study the academic texts regularly. (8)
Always take care of health and be neat and clean. (9)
In any program, to take floor or to go outside, take the permission form the chair. (10)
Serve the people irrespective of caste, creed, religion, tribe etc.
